short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automates lead generation and nurturing on LinkedIN

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to automate your lead generation on LinkedIN and particularly: 
1. To create groups of leads. 
2. To invite LinkedIN profiles automatically, either by searching LinkedIN or by uploading a CSV. 
3. Once invitation was accepted, add leads to a group and send them a sequence messages with time gaps between them. 
4. leads into a CSV, including emails.
